channel.title: How do you link your fourm registration to your server registration?

item.dc:creator: @Slappa4 Slappa4
item.description:
@Slappa4 wrote:

I dunno, theres a certian way of doing it. Once you create an account on the servers fourm you can logon the server with the same username and pass as the fourm and you can play. But you have to join the fourm.
